title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Strengthening: Blended Mathematics Course Design Based on Quantum Learning Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core elements of a blended learning framework in a hybrid learning environment: LMS characteristics, instructor roles, online-offline integration strategies, assessment systems, and interaction design.
Learners can develop three or more blended learning activity designs applicable to math subjects.
Learners can diagnose the effectiveness of online learning modules with 80% or higher accuracy using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
